dove.util.struct.tree

Class Tree.GoThroughManager<N extends Tree<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dove.util.treelib.Tree.GoThroughManager<N>
  • Enclosing class:
    Tree<T> 

    protected class Tree.GoThroughManager<N extends Tree<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    defines all operations needed during
    See Also:
    to define the way, the algorithm runs through the tree this class can be overrided, to analyse the tree (compare getHeight() or listNodes())

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accept(N tTree)
      called for every node this method can be overriden, in order to analyse the tree
      boolean breakOff()
      this method is checked in every loop runthrough of Tree.goThroughTree(...) if this method returns true, the algorithm will break off
      void levelChanged(java.lang.Integer integer)
      this method is called if goThroughTree goes one level deeper / higher whilst running through the tree
      void nextNode(Tree<T> tree)
      workaround to make accept available for trees (issues with generics)

      • levelChanged

        public void levelChanged(java.lang.Integer integer)
        this method is called if goThroughTree goes one level deeper / higher whilst running through the tree
        Parameters:
        integer - the level, the algorithm currently is running through

      • breakOff

        public boolean breakOff()
        this method is checked in every loop runthrough of Tree.goThroughTree(...) if this method returns true, the algorithm will break off
        Returns:
        true if the algorithm should break off
